com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.extraction

Interface CheckInformation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TypedCheckInformation<DocumentType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TypedCheckInformationImpl

    public interface CheckInformation
    The CheckInformation is used to specify all settings depending the current Check of a Document.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAbsoluteDocumentOffset()
      Gets the offset representing the start of the Document text relative to the whole document.
      AdditionalData getAdditionalMetaData() 
      CheckScope getCheckScope()
      Returns the current check scope of the document.
      Document getDocument()
      Gets the Document containing the text for a check.
      boolean isCompleteCheck()
      Returns true if the check information has been obtained from the complete Document.
      boolean isUseServerSideXmlExtraction() 

    • Method Detail

      • getDocument

        Document getDocument()
        Gets the Document containing the text for a check. The Document could be a part of the whole document.
        Returns:
        the document

      • getAbsoluteDocumentOffset

        int getAbsoluteDocumentOffset()
        Gets the offset representing the start of the Document text relative to the whole document. If you check the whole document this should be 0.
        Returns:
        the offset

      • isCompleteCheck

        boolean isCompleteCheck()
        Returns true if the check information has been obtained from the complete Document.

      • getAdditionalMetaData

        AdditionalData getAdditionalMetaData()
        Returns:
        The AdditionalData for this Check.

      • getCheckScope

        CheckScope getCheckScope()
        Returns the current check scope of the document. The Checking scope can be implementation-specific like 'page 1' or 'chapter 10'. It is stored in the report database to be used by queries. Has no other effect on checking.
        Returns:

      • isUseServerSideXmlExtraction

        boolean isUseServerSideXmlExtraction()
